column4: Helo I cant seem to partiton my ubuntu with windows side-by-side for some reason.
do you already have a free partition or are you trying to shrink your windows partition?
Im trying to make my windows partiton bigger than Ubuntu's
I cant see the slidder that I saw in a tutorial
boot into the live cd and run gparted
if you still cant resize your partitions you could have some files near the end of one of your partitions, so it wont let you
It looks like i have a lot of partitons
does anybody have a way to auto-disable compiz when you launch a 3d app/fullscreen app (that works with games running in Wine) ?
yeh, you can resize which ever ones you want now
right click on the partition you want to resize, then select the resize/move option
